title: 24/7 Ranked Poll!
body:
I am one of the many people who works during the night, and sleeps during the day giving no time for ranked and climbing :c
I would love to see ranked come up 24/7 so i can get home and play.

Its been 2 years since release please riot!

replies.body:
>who works during the night, and sleeps during the day 

If this brings you to the point you can't play league, either this is 100% of what you do, or your just not trying to play on the side of work that actually has ranked.
